listData.name: All-In-One
listData.description: Our All-In-One account is ideal for members who wish to use the equity in their owner occupied property to access an ongoing and flexible source of credit with no minimum repayment required provided the balance stays below the limit.

features.additionalInfo: Make purchases online or in-store using your Visa Debit card, including paywave.
Transfer or make payments using our mobile app or internet banking. Payments made with PayID or using Osko are received in near real-time.
Transfer or make payments using our mobile app or internet banking. Payments made with PayID or using Osko are received in near real-time.

Drawdown your line of credit at any time without having to reapply. No fixed repayments - make repayments only to keep your balance under the approved limit. Interest is only charged on the amount drawn. Please see our website for more information.

fees.name: Statement Retrieval Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Fee applies for statements over 12 months old. 1st page $6, and $1.50 for each subsequent page. Payable on request to issue a copy of a previously issued statement.

fees.name: Legal Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable at cost when legal advice or services are required over the life of the loan.

fees.name: Third Party Document Production Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable at cost if the Bank incurs costs or had to pay a third party in connection with something that needs to be done under the Loan or Security.

fees.name: Title Consent Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable when we are requested to consent to a change relating to your title.

fees.name: Loan Contract Variation Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Charged when we process a variation of your contract or any security such as; substitution, partial release, additional or transfer of security, amendment to the term of a loan or a loan account.

fees.name: Withdrawal of Caveat Non-Settlement Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Without settlement per document. When we are requested to remove a caveat lodged on a title.

fees.name: Withdrawal of Caveat Settlement Fee
fees.additionalInfo: With settlement per document. When we are requested to remove a caveat lodged on a title.

fees.name: Referral Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Where a line of credit has insufficient available funds to cover a direct debit transaction, and the transaction is honoured by BCU.

fees.name: Dishonour Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable when a direct debit set up on your line of credit is dishonoured due to insufficient funds.

fees.name: Auto Transfer Dishonour Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Where a line of credit has insufficient available funds to cover an external auto transfer transaction, and the transaction is dishonoured by BCU.

fees.name: Visa Foreign Currency Conversion Fee
fees.additionalInfo: 3% of the transaction value in AUD. When you use your Visa Credit or Debit card in a foreign currency either online or at a merchant point of sale outside or in Australia. Please refer to our website for more information.

fees.name: Card Replacement - Standard Fee
fees.additionalInfo: For the replacement of a lost or damaged Visa Debit card.

fees.name: Card Replacement - Urgent Fee
fees.additionalInfo: For the urgent replacement of a lost or damaged Visa Debit card.

fees.name: Emergency Card Replacement - Approved Fee
fees.additionalInfo: For the issue of a temporary emergency Visa Debit card, to temporarily replace a lost, stolen or damaged Visa Debit card.

fees.name: Foreign Cheque Deposit <$25,000 Fee
fees.additionalInfo: $10 fee for foreign cheque deposits up to $25,000 AUD. Eligible members can deposit foreign cheques in branch.

fees.name: Foreign Cheque Deposit $25,000+ Fee
fees.additionalInfo: $60 fee for foreign cheque deposits of $25,000 AUD or more. Eligible members can deposit foreign cheques in branch.

fees.name: Default Notification Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable at cost when we issue a default notice because you are in default under the contract.

fees.name: Late Payment Notification Fee
fees.additionalInfo: When payment to a home loan becomes overdue by 11 and 30 days.

fees.name: Management Administration Fee
fees.additionalInfo: When payment to a home loan becomes overdue by more than 90 days.

fees.name: Collection Agent Administration Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable when you are in arrears for more than 90 days and we choose to engage an external collection agent.

fees.name: GOVT Registration of Mortgage
fees.additionalInfo: This fee is payable to the bank in reimbursement of Government charges relating to registration of mortgage on the security property. Amounts are set by the land titles office by each state or territory.

fees.name: GOVT Discharge of Mortgage
fees.additionalInfo: This fee is payable to the bank in reimbursement of Government charges relating to discharge of mortgage on the security property. Amounts are set by the land titles office by each state or territory.

fees.name: GOVT Title Search Fee
fees.additionalInfo: This fee is payable to the bank in reimbursement of Government charges relating to obtaining title searches on the security property. Amounts are set by the land titles office by each state or territory.

fees.name: Declined Emergency Visa Card Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable if your emergency card request is declined.

fees.name: Loan Establishment Fee
fees.additionalInfo: No fee for establishment or top-up of the home loan.

fees.name: Valuation Fee
fees.additionalInfo: First valuation is free. Additional valuations are charged to you at the cost we have incurred.

fees.name: Discharge of Mortgage Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Charged for the preparation of documents for the discharge of mortgage. Additional fees apply if more than one security, refer website for details.

fees.name: Lenders Mortgage Insurance
fees.additionalInfo: LMI is insurance that protects the bank if the borrower/s are unable to make home loan repayments. LMI is required when a borrowers deposit is generally less than 20% of the property value plus other government fees. Please see our fact sheet for details.

fees.name: Over Limit Management Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Charged when an overdraft or line of credit account exceeds the approved limit by more than $50 during the month.

fees.name: Document Preparation Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Fee for preparation of loan contracts charged at the time of funding or settlement of the loan.

listData.name: Bridging Loan
listData.description: BCU Bank's bridging loan is a short-term fully secured loan, that allows you to finance the purchase or construction of a new home before your current home is sold.

features.additionalInfo: Transfer or make payments using our mobile app or internet banking. Payments made with PayID or using Osko are received in near real-time.

fees.name: Statement Retrieval Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Fee applies for statements over 12 months old. 1st page $6, and $1.50 for each subsequent page.

fees.name: Loan Establishment Fee
fees.additionalInfo: No fee for establishment or top-up of the home loan.

fees.name: Legal Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable at cost when legal advice or services are required over the life of the loan.

fees.name: Third Party Document Production Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable at cost if the Bank incurs costs or had to pay a third party in connection with something that needs to be done under the Loan or Security.

fees.name: Title Consent Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable when we are requested to consent to a change relating to your title.

fees.name: Loan Contract Variation Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Charged when we process a variation of your contract or any security such as; substitution, partial release, additional or transfer of security, amendment to the term of a loan or a loan account.

fees.name: Withdrawal of Caveat Non-Settlement Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Without settlement per document. When we are requested to remove a caveat lodged on a title.

fees.name: Caveat Withdrawal Settlement Fee
fees.additionalInfo: With settlement per document. When we are requested to remove a caveat lodged on a title.

fees.name: Construction Progress Payment Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Charged per drawdown payment that is made on your construction loan.

fees.name: Loan Account Switching Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Charged for switching your home loan to a different product on your request.

fees.name: Valuation Fee
fees.additionalInfo: First valuation is free. Additional valuations are charged to you at the cost we have incurred.

fees.name: Discharge of Mortgage Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Charged for the preparation of documents for the discharge of mortgage. Each additional security discharged is $195, please refer to website for details.

fees.name: Lender Mortgage Insurance
fees.additionalInfo: LMI is insurance that protects the bank if the borrower/s are unable to make home loan repayments. LMI is required when a borrowers deposit is generally less than 20% of the property value plus other government fees. Please see our fact sheet for details.

fees.name: Document Preparation Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Fee for preparation of loan contracts charged at the time of funding or settlement of the loan

fees.name: Default Notification Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable at cost when we issue a default notice because you are in default under the contract.

fees.name: Late Payment Notification Fee
fees.additionalInfo: When payment to a home loan becomes overdue by 11 and 30 days.

fees.name: Management Administration Fee
fees.additionalInfo: When payment to a home loan becomes overdue by more than 90 days.

fees.name: Collection Agent Administration Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable when you are in arrears for more than 90 days and we choose to engage an external collection agent.

fees.name: GOVT Registration of Mortgage
fees.additionalInfo: This fee is payable to the bank in reimbursement of Government charges relating to registration of mortgage on the security property. Amounts are set by the land titles office by each state or territory.

fees.name: GOVT Discharge of Mortgage
fees.additionalInfo: This fee is payable to the bank in reimbursement of Government charges relating to discharge of mortgage on the security property. Amounts are set by the land titles office by each state or territory.

fees.name: GOVT Title Search Fee
fees.additionalInfo: This fee is payable to the bank in reimbursement of Government charges relating to obtaining title searches on the security property. Amounts are set by the land titles office by each state or territory.

features.additionalInfo: Redraw online if you're ahead on your repayments.
Transfer or make payments using our mobile app or internet banking. Payments made with PayID or using Osko are received in near real-time.

Mortgage Offset Savings account is available for this loan. Offset account must be held in the name of one or more (or all) of the home loan borrowers. Only one offset account may be linked to a home loan account at any time.
Fee free redraw is available for this home loan if you're ahead on your repayments.

listData.description: BCU Bank's Basic Investment  home loan is a variable home loan suitable for investors, with a low variable rate, no monthly fee and no application fees.

features.additionalInfo: Redraw online if you're ahead on your repayments.
Transfer or make payments using our mobile app or internet banking. Payments made with PayID or using Osko are received in near real-time.
Fee free redraw is available for this home loan if you're ahead on your repayments.

fees.name: Statement Retrieval Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Fee applies for statements over 12 months old. 1st page $6, and $1.50 for each subsequent page.

fees.name: Loan Establishment Fee
fees.additionalInfo: No fee for establishment or top-up of the home loan.

fees.name: Legal Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable at cost when legal advice or services are required over the life of the loan.

fees.name: Third Party Document Production Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable at cost if the Bank incurs costs or had to pay a third party in connection with something that needs to be done under the Loan or Security.

fees.name: Title Consent Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable when we are requested to consent to a change relating to your title.

fees.name: Loan Contract Variation Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Charged when we process a variation of your contract or any security such as; substitution, partial release, additional or transfer of security, amendment to the term of a loan or a loan account.

fees.name: Withdrawal of Caveat Non-Settlement Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Without settlement per document. When we are requested to remove a caveat lodged on a title.

fees.name: Caveat Withdrawal Settlement Fee
fees.additionalInfo: With settlement per document. When we are requested to remove a caveat lodged on a title.

fees.name: Construction Progress Payment Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Charged per drawdown payment that is made on your construction loan.

fees.name: Loan Account Switching Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Charged for switching your home loan to a different product on your request.

fees.name: Valuation Fee
fees.additionalInfo: First valuation is free. Additional valuations are charged to you at the cost we have incurred.

fees.name: Discharge of Mortgage Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Charged for the preparation of documents for the discharge of mortgage. Each additional security discharged is $195, please refer to website for details.

fees.name: Lender Mortgage Insurance
fees.additionalInfo: LMI is insurance that protects the bank if the borrower/s are unable to make home loan repayments. LMI is required when a borrowers deposit is generally less than 20% of the property value plus other government fees. Please see our fact sheet for details.

fees.name: Document Preparation Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Fee for preparation of loan contracts charged at the time of funding or settlement of the loan

fees.name: Default Notification Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable at cost when we issue a default notice because you are in default under the contract.

fees.name: Late Payment Notification Fee
fees.additionalInfo: When payment to a home loan becomes overdue by 11 and 30 days.

fees.name: Management Administration Fee
fees.additionalInfo: When payment to a home loan becomes overdue by more than 90 days.

fees.name: Collection Agent Administration Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable when you are in arrears for more than 90 days and we choose to engage an external collection agent.

fees.name: GOVT Registration of Mortgage
fees.additionalInfo: This fee is payable to the bank in reimbursement of Government charges relating to registration of mortgage on the security property. Amounts are set by the land titles office by each state or territory.

fees.name: GOVT Discharge of Mortgage
fees.additionalInfo: This fee is payable to the bank in reimbursement of Government charges relating to discharge of mortgage on the security property. Amounts are set by the land titles office by each state or territory.

fees.name: GOVT Title Search Fee
fees.additionalInfo: This fee is payable to the bank in reimbursement of Government charges relating to obtaining title searches on the security property. Amounts are set by the land titles office by each state or territory.
